body_html:
Hi,
Have you solved this problem? I saw this "https://github.com/hughperkins/tf-coriander", they have run Tensorflow on OpenCL™ 1.2 GPU, but I don't know if this method applies to Altera FPGA. You can have a try. Good luck!

body:
Hi,
      Have you solved this problem? I saw this "https://github.com/hughperkins/tf-coriander", they have run Tensorflow on OpenCL™ 1.2 GPU, but I don't know if this method applies to Altera FPGA. You can have a try. Good luck!
